content:
Today @John Clyne will be presenting on Project Pythia at the Earth Cube Annual Meeting! If you are interested in this project, please check out the portal here https://projectpythia.org/ !

"Project Pythia is a community educational resource for helping students, scientists, and educators learn how to analyze and visualize geosciences data using the Scientifc Python Ecosystem."

Here is a link some of the "foundations" content, which is still very much a work in progress!
The poster is in the upper right-hand corner of our fine virtual poster hall today :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
